questions.question: A data analyst is working with a dataset that contains information about customer purchases over the past year. The analyst notices multiple instances where the same purchase appears twice with identical timestamps and transaction IDs. Which data quality issue is the analyst encountering?

A company maintains customer data in separate systems for sales, support, and billing. The marketing team needs a comprehensive view of customer interactions. Which type of data environment would be MOST appropriate to implement?
A data analyst needs to work with a dataset that is updated in real-time and contains both structured and unstructured data. Which data storage solution would be MOST appropriate?
An organization is implementing a data governance program. Which of the following would be the MOST important first step?
options: Defining data ownership and stewardship roles
Migrating all data to the cloud

questions.question: A data analyst is working with a large dataset and wants to identify natural groupings of similar items within the data without predefined categories. Which data mining technique would be MOST appropriate?
A retail company wants to analyze its sales data to understand which products are frequently purchased together. Which data mining technique would be MOST effective for this analysis?
A data analyst is working with a dataset containing 50 variables but needs to reduce the dimensionality while preserving as much information as possible. Which technique would be MOST appropriate?
A data analyst needs to determine if there is a relationship between customer age and purchase amount. Which analytical method would be MOST appropriate?
A marketing team wants to segment their customer base based on purchasing behavior, demographics, and engagement metrics. Which analytical approach would be MOST effective?
A data analyst wants to determine if a new website design has significantly improved conversion rates compared to the old design. Which statistical test would be MOST appropriate?
A data analyst needs to visualize the relationship between three variables: product category, sales amount, and profit margin. Which type of visualization would be MOST effective?
A data analyst wants to show how sales performance has changed over the past 24 months across five different regions. Which visualization would be MOST appropriate?

A data analyst has created a dashboard for executives that contains several complex visualizations. Users are finding it difficult to interpret the data. Which of the following would be the MOST effective improvement?
options: Include raw data tables with the visualizations
Simplify the visualizations and add clear titles and annotations
Use more vibrant colors to make the charts stand out

questions.question: A data analyst is working with a dataset where 10% of the age values are missing. Which approach would be MOST appropriate for handling this missing data?
options: Delete all records with missing age values
Replace missing values with the mean or median age
Leave the missing values as is

questions.question: A data analyst notices that the sales amount column in a dataset contains values with different currencies ($, €, £). Which data preparation step should be performed FIRST?
options: Convert all values to a standard currency using exchange rates
Create separate columns for each currency
Use the mean value for all records

questions.question: A data analyst is preparing a dataset for machine learning and notices that the 'income' variable has a few extremely high values that are skewing the distribution. Which technique would be MOST appropriate to address this issue?
options: Apply log transformation to the income variable
Replace outliers with the mean value
Ignore the outliers as they represent valid data

questions.question: A data analyst is working with personally identifiable information (PII) for a market research project. Which of the following approaches would be MOST appropriate to protect privacy?
options: Store the data on a personal laptop for convenience
Share the raw data with all stakeholders
Anonymize the data by removing identifying information
Use basic password protection for data files

questions.question: A data analyst discovers that a predictive model for loan approvals shows bias against a protected demographic group. What should the analyst do FIRST?
options: Deploy the model anyway as it has good overall accuracy
Document the bias and investigate its source in the data or algorithm
Add more variables to the model to improve its performance
Remove the protected demographic variable from the dataset

questions.question: A company is implementing data retention policies. Which of the following would be the MOST important consideration?
options: Storing all data indefinitely for possible future use
Compliance with relevant regulations regarding data retention periods
Minimizing storage costs by deleting all data after analysis
Giving individual departments complete control over their data retention

questions.question: A data analyst has built a classification model to predict customer churn. Which metric would be MOST appropriate to evaluate this model if the classes are highly imbalanced (few churned customers)?
